        public final boolean addCalorie(java.lang.String activityUser,

                                double recommendedCalorie,

                                double protein,
                                double fat,
                                double carbs,
                                double fiber)
        Method to add calorie to the table
        Specified by:
        addCalorie in interface NutritionLibraryBeanLocal
        Parameters:
        activityUser - the activity user
        foodName - the food name
        recommendedCalorie - the recommended calorie
        calorie - the calorie for 100g of the food
        protein - the protein for 100g of the food
        fat - the fat for 100g of the food
        carbs - the carbs for 100g of the food
        fiber - the fiber for 100g of the food
        Returns:
        true if the calorie has been added
